address.desc: composite field. there must be six columns in your datatframe for each address field on quickbase. street 1, street 2, city, state, zip, country

numeric-percent.desc: supports floats from zero to one inclusive

date.desc: date as a string or Datetime object. must specify date format as an argument eg. "Y-D-M" eg. "2019-12-18".

timestamp.desc: datetime as a string or a Datetime object. must specify datetime format as an argument eg. "Y-D-M H:m:s" 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ'

time-of-day.desc: military time as a string. must specify time-of-day format eg. "hh:mm:ss.sss" military time hh:mm:ss.sss

checkbox.desc: boolean as a int, string or bool. not case sensitve. false, 'no', 'n', 'f', 'false', 0 are all false, everything else is true except None

phone.desc: phone number as a string. must specify phone-number format eg. "(###) ###-#### x####" pound signs indicate digits. the first 10 digits are required, extension is optional."(123) 456-7890 x123"

user.desc: dictionary containing the user data that must include the user's ID eg. { "id": "123456.ab1s" }
